data.description: Ironing is a technique where the nozzle travels over the top-most layer after printing it, to iron the top layers to a smooth surface. The child settings for ironing can be adjusted to get the desired surface finish.
data.img_description: The left image has ironing disabled, the right image has ironing enabled.
data.hints: - Using ironing on models with a lot of top surface detail might not work properly.
